info.name: ERP
info.description:
This Postman collection contains API endpoints for managing user data in the ERP backend system. It includes the following functionalities:

1. **Create User**: Allows you to create a new user by providing user details.
    
2. **Get All Users**: Retrieves a list of all registered users from the system.

request.description:
**POST /user** (Create User)

This API is used to create a new user. It accepts user details in the request body and stores them in the database.

**Request**:

- **Method**:POST
    
- **Body**: { "firstName": "Vyshak", "lastName":"Asokan", "role": "user", "email":"[vyshak@gmail.com](https://mailto:vyshak@gmail.com)", "mobile": "8086433771", "password":"vyshak123" }
    

**Response**:

- Returns a success message.

**GET /** (Get All Users)

This API fetches all the users stored in the database.

**Request**:

- **Method**: GET
    

**Response**:

- Returns an array of user objects with their details.
    

\[ { "id": 1, "firstName": "Vyshak", "lastName": "Asokan", "role": "user", "email": "[vyshak@gmail.com](https://mailto:vyshak@gmail.com)", "mobile": "8086433771", "password": "$2b$10$KrHgWVpYcXIv2Z7.jWqVc.tF7vDDKMHXZ7v1zjYAA0ngNxRgAkerO" }\]
